author: cbs8
title: Vendor Network Is Coming to SEMA 2015 -- Catch the Wave! (Booth 91008)
text:
MrktServ Holdings, Inc.
ROLLING MEADOWS, Ill. , Oct. 22, SEMA is right around the corner-and Vendor Network will be there.
Online ordering for automotive parts and accessories will put even greater demand on manufacturers to have rich data in the right places to meet fast-changing customer expectations. Vendor Network is focused on helping automotive companies manage and benefit from this shift.
"With more players, sales channels and marketing platforms than ever, it's not just what you sell but how you sell it," says CEO Ken LeBlanc . "Visibility is crucial and everything we do is geared toward strategically placing products online with the information and experience necessary to turn shoppers into buyers."
Vendor Network partners with automotive parts sellers to broaden their marketplace exposure, pull in buyers and boost sales. The company specializes in data management, promotion and enriched content development with no upfront costs to its customers.
"We are excited for this opportunity to engage the industry in tomorrow's cognitive data-driven online commerce solutions," LeBlanc notes. "Automotive mobile apps and online marketplaces will need to respond to rapidly changing consumer expectations. Online selling has moved beyond simply uploading a paper catalog and requiring a user to plow through a vast product selection. Partnering with Vendor Network is a great and easy way to help your company catch the next big wave in online selling and ordering."
Getting the data in shape
The Vendor Network process begins with a top-to-bottom analysis of the customer's product information-product specs and descriptions, images, pricing, part numbers, superseded items, UPC codes, ACES application files and more. Experienced data analysts flag and repair gaps and inaccuracies, update the data, and trouble-shoot it continually to keep it current and error-free.
Expanding the customer's reach
The company then promotes the customer's products across multiple platforms and on major marketplace sites with crystal-clear product descriptions and enriched custom content.
A unique-and affordable-solution
Customers pay no upfront costs, setup fees or monthly charges to Vendor Network. The company's compensation is based on the customer's sales gains in the new marketplaces.
Vendor Network marketplace experts will be on hand in Booth 91008 at the 2015 SEMA Show. "Our sole focus is on our customers' success, measured in increased revenue," says Ken LeBlanc .
About Vendor Network
A subsidiary of MrktServ Holdings, Inc., Vendor Network is a team of dedicated professionals that partners with retailers and sellers to help drive sales across multiple marketplace platforms.
About MrktServ Holdings, Inc.
MrktServ Holdings is dedicated to improving the online purchasing experience for consumers. MrktServ provides online solutions in the areas of content management and data creation for key sales platforms. Clients range in size from small business to large retailers. For more information about MrktServ Holdings and its entities, visit the company's website at http://www.mrktservholdings.com/
Contact:
